item.text: Welcome to our study! We’re thrilled to have you on board. Your contributions will be instrumental in advancing our understanding of cardiovascular health and research. The insights we gain from this study inform how we move forward with further research studies focused on optimising health.

We understand that your time is valuable, so we will do our best to keep the daily time commitment to a minimum. 
We encourage you to complete the available surveys daily, but if that’s not possible on a given day, the surveys will stay active so you can complete them at a later time when you have a free moment. Or if you would like to complete them all at once ahead of time, you may do so as well.

Please complete each of the activities/tasks at least once, if you’re physically able. For research purposes, having more than one data point on each of these is ideal, so we would appreciate  if you could complete each task more than once. If you find one of the activities you enjoy, feel free to do that task as many times as you like.

The Health Dashboard combines many areas that contribute to overall health into one "health score". While 100 doesn't mean you are the healthiest person alive, and 0 doesn't mean the opposite, higher scores generally mean better health. This is a tool you can use to track over time to see how your health is changing as you change your habits.

Feel free to refer back to this information at any time as you progress through this study. We hope you feel ready and confident to help us progress research!

If you have any questions or comments please email us at myheartcounts@stanford.edu. We will get back to you as quickly as possible!

Finally, we want to thank you for participating in our study!
 - The My Heart Counts Team
